message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
Thank you for the offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere at a lower price. I am willing to pay $95 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I can meet you in the middle at $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I appreciate your offer, but I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $100 for it.
